result.execSummary:
The defendant was charged with both OWI (2nd) and Operating w/ PAC (2nd). The defendant was found guilty of OWI (2nd) and the other charge, Operating w/ PAC (2nd) was dismissed by the court.

  • Randy A. Moore was found guilty of OWI (2nd), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

CONSECUTIVE to 15CM1091.  Huber privileges are allowed.

ADDRESS INFO for Randy A. Moore
Current: 26410 Main St., Coolville, OH 45723 United States  (Effective: 09-30-2016)
Prior: 9431 67th Street, Kenosha, WI 53142

State of Wisconsin appears by Atty K. Richard Wells. DE appears in person with Atty Robert Keller. DE's family present in court.   Clerk P. Scypta.   
MINUTES: 1119 - DE enters plea of no contest to Ct1 - found guilty by the Court. Remaining counts dismissed outright. Sentence recommendations. Defendant is sentenced to 60 days in the Kenosha County Jail w/ huber - consecutive to 15CM1091. DE give credit for Chpt 85 treatment. Court orders a $600 fine plus costs, due in 30 days or civil judgment.  Defendant is ordered to submit to a DNA sample & pay DNA surcharge and notice is given. DL suspended for 24 months. Ignition interlock ordered. Intox assessment ordered. Appeals rights given.
OWI 2d Offense

State of Wisconsin appears by Atty K. Richard Wells, Special Prosecutor. DE appears by Atty Bob Keller. DE's appearance waived.  Clerk P. Scypta.   
MINUTES:  950 - DE is still participating in in-patient program out of state. PLEAS to be scheduled.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 30, 2016 at 11:00 am.

State of Wisconsin/Kenosha County appears by Atty K. Richard Wells. DE appears by Atty Robert Keller. DE's appearance waived. Clerk P. Scypta.   
MINUTES:  1031 - Atty Keller reports DE is in-patient in Ohio - adjournment requested. Granted.  Final pre-trial scheduled for August 31, 2016 at 09:45 am.
NO RECORD MADE. Hearing rescheduled due to DE's medical condition.  Final pre-trial scheduled for July 20, 2016 at 10:15 am.

State of Wisconsin and Kenosha County appears by Atty K. Richard Wells. DE appears in person with Atty Robert Keller.   Clerk P. Scypta.   
MINUTES: Matter heard with 15CM1091 and TR files. DE has new charges. Atty Wells wishes to refer these cases to veteran's court - adjournment requested. Discussion held. Adjournment granted - ST does not request modification of bond.  Final pre-trial scheduled for June 23, 2016 at 02:00 pm.

State of Wisconsin appears by Atty K. Richard Wells. DE appears in person with Atty Robert Keller.   Clerk P. Scypta.   
MINUTES: 249 - Matter heard with 15CM1091 and trailing TR files. Parties request an adjournment to discuss possible resolution, as DE does not qualify for veterans court - granted. Bond continues.  Final pre-trial scheduled for May 12, 2016 at 02:00 pm.
NO RECORD MADE. DE is compliant with WCS reporting. FPT rescheduled per Attys Burgoyne and Keller.  Final pre-trial scheduled for April 11, 2016 at 02:30 pm.
Per Atty Keller - FPT rescheduled to 3/14 @ 1:30pm due to scheduling conflict. Attys confirm by e-mail.
Final pre-trial at 03-02-2016 08:30 am
NO RECORD MADE. Case rescheduled prior to hearing.  Final pre-trial scheduled for March 2, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Tracey Braun appeared for the State. DE appears with Atty Robert Keller.   Clerk P. Scypta.   
MINUTES: Matter heard with 15CM1091. Matters set to trail criminal files. DA pre-trial scheduled 12/11/15 @ 1:30pm. Final pre-trial set for 1/21/16 @ 10am.
